scripts.link: rsync -va node_modules/@fontsource node_modules/katex node_modules/modern-normalize node_modules/mermaid static && pnpm run link:assets |:
scripts.build:local: pnpm run link && pnpm run compile:js && zola-bin build
scripts.dist: rm -rf dist/templates && mkdirp dist/static && pnpm run build && cp -r templates theme.toml config.toml dist && cp -r static/*.js public/*.css dist/static
